messages.message: I've been thinking about how to do vanilla-browser dat/beaker site gateways. Rather than an AWS service that serves http like hashbase, ship a webrtc dat client and a static website generator client, that way the content can live behind conventional zero-conf'd networking gear and the static client lives on cheap s3/gh-pages
